src:
Kevin/Marcus Melaju, Ini Hasil Lengkap Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019
05 Nov 2019, 17:24 by Danang Sundoro



Kevin/Marcus Melaju, Ini Hasil Lengkap Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019



Kevin/Marcus Melaju, Ini Hasil Lengkap Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019


KBRN, Jakarta : Ganda nomor satu dunia asal Indonesia, Kevin Sanjaya Sukamuljo/Marcus Fernaldi Gideon melaju ke babak kedua Fuzhou China Open 2019 di Haixia Olympic Sports Center, Selasa (5/11/2019).The Minions, Kevin/Marcus dengan mudah mengalahkan ganda putra Malaysia, Goh V Shem/Tan Wee Kiong, lewat permainan straight game, 21-15, 21-16. Gaya menyerang, Kevin/Marcus sejak awal, seakan tidak ingin memberikan kesempatan pada Goh/Tan untuk mengoleksi point demi point. Namun demikian, pasangan Malaysia Goh/Tan diakui Kevin memiliki pertahanan yang kuat.“Pasangan Malaysia punya pertahanan yang kuat dan serangan yang tajam. Tapi untungnya kami bisa beradaptasi dengan kondisi lapangan dengan cepat dan bisa langsung in dari awal,” kata Kevin dalam keterangan tertulisnya dari PP.PBSI kepada Radio Republik Indonesia, Selasa (5/11/2019).“Bolanya memang berat, jadi perlu tenaga ekstra. Saya juga dalam kondisi nggak fit, agak flu sedikit, jadi lumayan mengganggu juga tadi. Kami tadi bisa dapat banyak poin dari pukulan pertama kedua, nggak terlalu banyak reli-reli panjang,” tandas Marcus. Baca Juga: Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019 : Rizki/Della Kalah, Rinov/Pitha Melaju Ke Babak KeduaHasil pertandingan ini, semakin menambah keunggulan Kevin/Marcus dalam rekor pertemuan dengan Goh/Tan menjadi 7-1. Kevin/Marcus baru saja memenangkan dua gelar juara pada dua pekan lalu di ajang Denmark Open 2019 dan French Open 2019 yang merupakan turnamen level super 750. Meskipun hanya menjalani persiapan beberapa hari ke turnamen Fuzhou China Open 2019, namun mereka tetap berharap dapat hasil terbaik “Lawan juga sama kondisinya, jadi ya nggak ada alasan. Ikut turnamen beruntun pasti kondisi menurun, tahun kemarin juga kurang lebih sama situasinya, jadi harusnya bisa. Target kami di sini kami bisa main maksimal,” sebut Kevin. Baca Juga: Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019: Ginting Angkat Koper di AwalPertandingan hari kedua Fuzhou China Open 2019 akan dilangsungkan besok, Rabu (6/11/2019) mulai pukul 10.00 waktu Fuzhou.
text:
Kevin / Marcus Goes Forward, This Is the Complete Result of the 2019 China Open Fuzhou Badminton
05 Nov 2019, 17:24 by Danang Sundoro



Kevin / Marcus Goes Forward, This Is the Complete Result of the 2019 China Open Fuzhou Badminton



Kevin / Marcus Goes Forward, This Is the Complete Result of the 2019 China Open Fuzhou Badminton


KBRN, Jakarta: World number one from Indonesia, Kevin Sanjaya Sukamuljo / Marcus Fernaldi Gideon advanced to the second round of the Fuzhou China Open 2019 at the Haixia Olympic Sports Center, Tuesday (11/05/2019). The Minions, Kevin / Marcus easily defeated Malaysian men's doubles, Goh V Shem / Tan Wee Kiong, through straight game play, 21-15, 21-16. Attacking style, Kevin / Marcus from the beginning, seemed not to want to give an opportunity to Goh / Tan to collect point by point. However, the Malaysian couple Goh / Tan recognized Kevin has a strong defense. "The Malaysian couple has a strong defense and sharp attacks. But fortunately we can adapt to field conditions quickly and can be directly in from the start, "Kevin said in his written statement from PP.PBSI to Radio Republik Indonesia, Tuesday (11/05/2019)." The ball is indeed heavy, so it needs extra energy . I'm also not in a good condition, I have a slight cold, so it's quite annoying too. "We were able to get a lot of points from the first hit the second, not too many long rallies," said Marcus. Also Read: Badminton Fuzhou China Open 2019: Rizki / Della Lose, Rinov / Pitha Advance to the Second Round The results of this match, further increasing the advantage of Kevin / Marcus in the record meeting with Goh / Tan to 7-1. Kevin / Marcus just won two titles two weeks ago at the 2019 Danish Open and the 2019 French Open, which is a super 750 level tournament. Although they are only preparing for a few days to the Fuzhou China Open 2019 tournament, they still hope for the best results " The opponent is also the same condition, so yes there is no reason. Joining a tournament in a row must have decreased, last year the situation was more or less the same, so it should be possible. Our target here is we can play optimally, "said Kevin. Also Read: Badminton Fuzhou China Open 2019: Ginting to Raise a Suitcase in the BeginningThe second day match of the Fuzhou China Open 2019 will take place tomorrow, Wednesday (11/06/2019) starting at 10:00 Fuzhou time.
